source.query: SELECT * FROM SYSIBM.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME='TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS' AND TABLE_SCHEMA='DWH'

DELETE FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS WHERE USE_RECORD_KEY IS NOT NULL
AND DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY NOT IN (SELECT USE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS))

activities.name: lkpInsertDuplicateRecordKeysIntoTmp
activities.description: 2-step tmp table process: first insert duplicate keys with calculated fee_cat_cd as it should be.  In second step, update temp table with what should be the duplicate_record_key and use_record_key.  Note that this step only handles records where FEE_CAT_CD is different.

source.query:
INSERT INTO DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS (KEY_1, KEY_2, FEE_CAT_CD_1, FEE_CAT_CD_2, COUNT_NCAN, LEG_STATUS, CALC_FEE_CAT_CD)
WITH DUPLICATES AS (
SELECT PERSON_ID, SESSION_CD, POST_CD, START_DT, END_DT
FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD
/*WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (2326004, 2265638, 2326006, 2265640, 2326104, 2327716, 2267355, 2355683, 2295391, 3591063, 3340713)*/
/*WHERE PERSON_ID='1005687669' AND SESSION_CD='20199'*/
/*WHERE PERSON_ID='1002628329' AND SESSION_CD='20199'*/
GROUP BY PERSON_ID, SESSION_CD, POST_CD, START_DT, END_DT
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1),
DUPLICATE_IDS AS (
SELECT CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY, PERSON_ID, SESSION_CD, POST_CD, START_DT, END_DT,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY PERSON_ID, SESSION_CD, POST_CD, START_DT, END_DT ORDER BY CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY) as C_ID
FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD
WHERE PERSON_ID IN (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM DUPLICATES) AND SESSION_CD IN (SELECT SESSION_CD FROM DUPLICATES) AND POST_CD IN (SELECT POST_CD FROM DUPLICATES) AND START_DT IN (SELECT START_DT FROM DUPLICATES) AND END_DT IN (SELECT END_DT FROM DUPLICATES)
),
DEDUP AS (
SELECT a.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY AS KEY_1, b.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY AS KEY_2,
c.FEE_CATEGORY_CD AS FEE_CAT_CD_1, d.FEE_CATEGORY_CD AS FEE_CAT_CD_2,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIS.NCAN WHERE PERSON_ID=a.PERSON_ID) AS COUNT_NCAN,
(SELECT LEG_STATUS FROM SIS.NCAN WHERE PERSON_ID=a.PERSON_ID AND a.END_DT BETWEEN LEG_STS_EFF_DT AND LEG_STS_EXP_DT) AS LEG_STATUS
from DUPLICATE_IDS a
INNER JOIN DUPLICATE_IDS b
ON a.PERSON_ID = b.PERSON_ID AND a.SESSION_CD=b.SESSION_CD and a.POST_CD=b.POST_CD and a.START_DT=b.START_DT and a.END_DT=b.END_DT
INNER JOIN DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD c on a.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY=c.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY
INNER JOIN DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD d ON b.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY=d.CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY
WHERE a.C_ID > 1
AND b.C_ID = 1
)
SELECT 
KEY_1, KEY_2, FEE_CAT_CD_1, FEE_CAT_CD_2, COUNT_NCAN, LEG_STATUS,
CASE WHEN LEG_STATUS IS NULL THEN 'D'
WHEN LEG_STATUS IS NOT NULL AND LEG_STATUS IN (0,1) THEN 'D'
WHEN LEG_STATUS IS NOT NULL AND LEG_STATUS NOT IN (0,1) THEN 'I'
ELSE 'U'
END AS CALC_FEE_CAT_CD
FROM DEDUP
WHERE FEE_CAT_CD_1 <> FEE_CAT_CD_2

activities.name: CopyRecordsToUpdateToCSV
activities.description: Backup records where duplicate keys will be updated to use keys.

query.value: @concat('SELECT * FROM DWH.', item(), ' WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS)')

source.query:
UPDATE DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS
SET USE_RECORD_KEY =
CASE WHEN FEE_CAT_CD_1 = CALC_FEE_CAT_CD THEN KEY_1
WHEN FEE_CAT_CD_2 = CALC_FEE_CAT_CD THEN KEY_2
WHEN CALC_FEE_CAT_CD = 'U' THEN NULL
ELSE NULL END,
DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY = 
CASE WHEN FEE_CAT_CD_1 = CALC_FEE_CAT_CD THEN KEY_2
WHEN FEE_CAT_CD_2 = CALC_FEE_CAT_CD THEN KEY_1
ELSE NULL END
DELETE FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS WHERE USE_RECORD_KEY IS NULL OR USE_RECORD_KEY=DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY OR USE_RECORD_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS)

activities.name: CopySCDDuplRecordsToCSV
activities.description: Backup records marked as Duplicate that will be deleted in the last step of the pipeline.

source.query: SELECT * FROM DWH.DIM_CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_SCD WHERE CANDIDATE_BACKGROUND_KEY IN (SELECT DUPLICATE_RECORD_KEY FROM DWH.TMP_DUPLICATE_KEYS)
